facts: The scene takes place in front of the calcinated remains of Gladys house.
The once-proud building is now a smoldering pile of rubble.
The police is trying to find out what happened to Gladys, so far is no sign of her
Chris wanders through the ruins as firemen mop up.
Chris had left to get a new stove while his aunt was cooking.
Chris picks something out of the char. The map of the mines.
It is almost completely burned. Soaked with water.
Chris stares at it for a heavy beat. All that remains of his legacy. Sam steps up.
comm_style: Chris is an office worker in his mid-thirties.
Chris is an underachiever, lazy and disorganized
Sam is the sheriff of the town, Prosperity
Sam is a confident, single mother
goals: Chris leaves the ruins with Sam
